product_name: Baby Jogger Car Seat Adapter for Single Strollers
long_description: Baby Jogger Car Seat Adapter lets you securely attach your car seat to your Baby Jogger stroller for on-the-go convenience. Designed to fit several styles of car seats, including those from Peg Perego, Maxi Cosi, Chicco, Graco and Evenflo.
short_description: Baby Jogger Car Seat Adapter lets you securely attach your car seat to your Baby Jogger stroller for on-the-go convenience.
